subject: FWD: Debt Consolidation.
body:
Dear Homeowner 

Are you tired of paying high interest rates?  Refinance with us 4 lower rate.  Act NOW to receive your pre-approved loan.

You can receive $270,000 for
$655 per month save 45%.

Please submit a s a p. 
http://ayciyaei.tripod.com

Maxine Mcdaniel
21st Century Finance


Do the right thing. It will gratify some people and astonish the rest.  -Mark Twain [Samuel Langhornne Clemens] (1835-1910)
